item.description:
Come join us at Harbor Park for a great night out!! Harbor Park on Sunday night is the place to be in the summer. This venue tonight will be great for socializing and having fun with our friends. Most importantly ladies and gentleman is that we will HAVE FUN!
The more that attend the merrier! It's gonna be great and it's actually my favorite summer time spot. Ask anyone from this area Harbor Park on Sunday is where it's happening so let's get out and enjoy the night! If any of you have any questions at all just email me. Looking forward to this : )
item.how_to_find_us: Give me a call or text me 860-919-9782.
item.name: Chilling on Sunday Night down by the Connecticut River
